info.author: Giusepe Amato
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
xODMR is an ATRN client that lets you use a mail backup service when your SMTP
server doesn't support ODMR natively. It's an alternative to xatrn and fetchmail
(but works with TLS too). It runs on any platform supported by Python. A Win32
binary is also available.
info.name: xODMR
info.html_description: xODMR is an ATRN client that lets you use a mail backup service when your SMTP server doesn’t support ODMR natively. It’s an alternative to xatrn and fetchmail (but works with TLS too). It runs on any platform supported by Python. A Win32 binary is also available.
